column5: The Chardonnay Room is located on the second floor overlooking the north part of the vineyard. It adjoins the Champagne Room (both rooms are available for booking separately but the adjoining doors can be opened if booked by the same party).  In keeping with the origin of the grape itself, the feel of the room is fresh, crisp and sophisticated in its furnishings and the color of the wine is reflected in the paint and d√©cor.
